embeds.title: 1) Be courteous, mindful of others, and keep it friendly.
embeds.description:
**a)** Treat everyone with respect. Absolutely no harassment, threats, slurs, witch hunting, sexism, racism, or hate speech will be tolerated. This includes telling people to commit acts of self harm.

**b)** Some slurs, even if not meant as an insult, should not be used. Please use your common sense.

**c)** Discussions regarding sensitive, disturbing or creepy topics like rape, suicide and incest will not be entertained in this server.

**d)** Do not post personal info of others' without their permission.

**e)** If you are subjected to any harassment, DM or ping the @Modmail bot and a moderator will get in touch with your as soon as possible.

**f)** Don't disrupt the conversation or engage in rampant shitposting. Keep the server warm and fuzzy.

embeds.title: 2) If you were banned or muted, don't use other accounts to rejoin the server.
embeds.description:
**a)** Do not incite drama about being muted or banned. Being mature and just talking to the mod team will go over much more smoothly.

**b)** If you have an issue with a mod or their mod actions, feel free to DM another mod to resolve the issue.

embeds.title: 3) Please don't spoil anyone.
embeds.description:
**a)** Spoiler-tag sensitive content and specify what the spoiler is for.
How to use spoiler tags:
Include the title and season/source âžœ
(rezero s1) `||Spoiler.||`
(rezero vol 14) `||Spoiler.||`

**b)** There is no expiration date for major plot points of any series, always spoiler-tag them.

**c)** Be extra careful with spoilers of anything that has been freshly released - not all people read/watch things right away.

embeds.title: 4) English is the main language of this server.
embeds.description: **a)** Full-blown conversations in other languages should be avoided if possible. Also, we can't moderate them. However, Japanese is allowed to some extent.

embeds.title: 5) Remember that the rules are just guidelines. In ambiguous cases, the mods will have the final say on the matter.
embeds.description:
**a)** Mods reserve the right to tell people to move on and discuss something else if they feel the current conversation is overly negative/ repetitive/ unproductive.

**b)** Follow discord's [community guidelines](https://discord.com/guidelines) and [terms of services](https://discordapp.com/terms).
